term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - zone in chromatography
term.title: zone

item.text: A region in the chromatographic bed where one or more components of the sample are located. The term band may also be used for it.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 824 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
